titleStmt.title: The epilogue writ by Mr. Dreyden ; spoke before His Majesty at Oxford, March 19, 1680.
titleStmt.author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
"Prepared for a special performance of Charles Saunders' Tamerlane the Great"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
